pages.text: Specials Sunday January 18th Fresh Lobster Night • Lobster night is a staff and customer favorite at The Refuge. Fresh-off-the-boat lobsters are flown down each Saturday from Vinalhaven, a small island located off the coast of Maine that is home to the second largest lobstering harbor in the world. All lobsters are one and half pounds and are perfectly steamed to order. They are served the Maine way with lemon, hot drawn butter and a variety of sides to choose from. Reservations are strongly suggested and quantities are limited. Come and enjoy the only whole steamed Maine lobster in the Low Country! 05:00 PM - 09:00 PM Tuesday January 20th Steakhouse Night • Steakhouse Night is overflowing with delicious cuts of meat, including Rib-eye. Choose from any of our six sauces and sides to complete your entree. All available cuts of meat are blackened or grilled. 08:00 AM - 09:00 PM Thursday January 22nd Prime Rib Night • We serve up delicious prime rib in 2 serving sizes, 10 oz (queen) or 12 oz (king), served with roasting fingerling potatoes, seared green beans, Au jus, and horseradish cream sauce. 05:00 PM - 09:00 PM Friday January 23rd Live Music Night • Join us for live music featuring fun and lively local acts who know to bring entertainment and play all of your favorite songs. They even take requests! Come early for prime bar seating! 07:00 PM - 10:00 PM
